questionTitle: "Please tell me the answer." "Well, I would if only I .............. it."
Every afternoon I ............ for a walk in the garden.
The Vietnamese people successfully carried ........... the August Revolution in 1945.
Somchai was a really silly boy when we were in high-school. I still remember ...................... very stupid questions.
"Was the conference a success?" "Yes, ........... people attended it than usual."
She did six hours' ...................... studying a day for her exam.
He went to a seaside resort because he was ................ on water-skiing.
The examiners often ...................... extremely difficult questions for the literature exam.
that he only started learning it two years ago, his English is excellent.
The ...................... exam in January prepared pupils for the real thing in June.
The school's exam results ...................... the headmaster.
"Do you know that beautiful lady over there?" "Yes, that's Wanida . She's ...................... in her group.
anwers: more beautiful than any other girl

questionTitle: They practically burn a hole in the earth's atmosphere and we suffer from the strong radiation ................ by the Sun's rays.
"Was he disappointed?" " Yes, he found the movie ......................"
" ...................... is it, by air, from Bangkok to Chiengmail?" "About 500 miles."
"............. did he pay for his transistor radio?"  "Only three hundred baht."
"Do you fix your own car?" "No, I always have a mechanic .......... it."
"Why are you so tired?" "Mrs. Jackson had me ............ with her child all afternoon".
